msg.msgText:
Set the IBM MessageSight server run mode or initiate a clean_store action. To initiate a clean_store action, the IBM MessageSight server should be in "maintenance" mode.
SYNTAX: imaserver runmode help imaserver runmode <modes> imaserver runmode clean_store
EXAMPLES: imaserver runmode maintenance imaserver runmode clean_store
The valid modes are: production: Production mode maintenance: Maintenance mode.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
